title: Features request: Undock, Connection Pannel options, Quick search
author: MariyanDI
body_snippet:
1) Add Option: Quick "Undock" option: Allows you to quickly create new 'Connection Panel' and move your current session to it with one click (similar to MS RDCM undock option)

2) Add Option/Properties of 'Connection Panel' to be a separate window with individual options: Minimize, Maximize. Allows you to minimize this window or main window only, while the other one remains opened.
